slosh.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if a liquid sloshes somewhere, or if you slosh it, it moves or is moved about in an uncontrolled way
slosh.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He put the glass down hard and beer sloshed over the edge.
Water was sloshing about in the bottom of the boat.
slosh.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to put a liquid in a container or on a surface in a careless way
slosh.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Jo sloshed more wine into her glass.
Slosh a bit of paint on.
slosh.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to walk through water or mud in a noisy way
slosh.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: People were sloshing around in the mud.
